post_body: Hi all I'm new here. Just started to learn how to code!

So I'm having a hard time with this chunk of code. Does anyone know how to make it work? function encodeImageFileAsURL(element) {var file = element.files(0); var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onloadend = function() {console.log('RESULT', reader.result)} reader.readAsDataURL(file);}
